manpage.title: floor

description.para: The floor function returns the largest integer value less than or equal to x, expressed as a floating-point number.

return.para: The floor function returns a floating-point value representing the largest integer that is less than or equal to x. There is no error return.

manpage.result: The floor of 2.8 is 2.000000 The floor of -2.8 is -3.000000
